comment.author: 10213344@N07
comment._content: This is such a great image of a hispanic man and I bet he is young but already looks physically tired.

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content:
you can really see the Indian in this man.  I think while he looks tired he has much dignity
Robstown is a small town between Kingsville and Corpus Christi.  Mostly citrus and grown there as well as vegetables and cotton.  When going through there we usually stop at a small roadside stand to buy citrus.
